short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a Chrome extension built by FluteSpace to support audio transcription for report generation.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
FLUTE is your go-to enterprise-grade Generative AI Copilot designed for Radiologists around the world. With FLUTE, radiologists can keep their focus on the most important task: delivering timely, accurate clinical diagnoses.

FLUTE solves your Radiology organization’s pain points:
1. Improve Radiologists’ Productivity - Enhance the reporting process by minimizing speech-to-text errors, enabling more efficient management of larger workloads.
2. Alleviate Radiologist Burnout - Reduce admin and cognitive burden, inefficient workflow and fatigue associated with manual reporting tasks.

Switch to FLUTE  — Fewer Clicks, Faster Reporting, Enterprise Grade AI.

Our advanced AI is all about understanding you. It recognizes both structured and natural speech patterns to create personalized reports tailored to each user and group. Let FLUTE handle the report generation while you focus on what you do best.

Add FLUTE to your browser in seconds and effortlessly dictate your findings into your microphone. Experience the freedom of dictating in your own style. We’ll auto-generate clinical history, structured findings, smart impressions and recommendations for you.

KEY FEATURES:
1. Ambient dictation - converts unstructured dictation to well articulated sentences and findings
2. Automatically creates smart impressions based on your preferred style
3. Sort impressions by their medical importance, helping Physicians prioritize critical patient care
4. Removes irrelevant text generated from background noise or other interference
5. Auto-correct mispronunciation
6. Map Clinical history, findings and recommendations to their relevant section

By using the FLUTE browser extension, you agree to FLUTE’s terms and conditions. (https://www.flutespace.com/terms-and-conditions).

The paid version of the FLUTE Lite extension is currently available exclusively to users in India. For private preview outside our current focus market, please submit your request at https://www.flutespace.com/#bookademo.

Disclaimer:   This extension uses Google Analytics to collect extension usage statistics to help improve user experience. If you want to opt-out of Google Analytics tracking, please visit http://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout or you can set up a filter in Adblock Plus or similar ad blocker tools like AdBlock, uBlock or Adblock Pro.
